biotools.summary:
CMIP performs a series of analysis centered in the obtention of molecular interaction potentials using classic formalisms:
Electrostatic interactions through coulombic potentials with several dielectric options or Poisson-Boltzmann equation
Van de Waals potentials computed from the Lennard-Jones expression
Electrostatic Solvation energy evaluated from PB potentials
Hydrophobic Solvation from surface analysis with a variety of alternative scales.

bioschemas.name: Classical Molecular Interaction Potentials (CMIP)
bioschemas.summary:
CMIP performs a series of analysis centered in the obtention of molecular interaction potentials using classic formalisms:
Electrostatic interactions through coulombic potentials with several dielectric options or Poisson-Boltzmann equation
Van de Waals potentials computed from the Lennard-Jones expression
Electrostatic Solvation energy evaluated from PB potentials
Hydrophobic Solvation from surface analysis with a variety of alternative scales.
